use_cases_desc: Collaboratively construct synthetic bio-design rules using tangible tokens
contribution_desc: A tangible interactive system with physical tokens and an interactive tabletop for collaborative bio-design process among synthetic biologists. Users can stamp physical active tokens to form rules of a biological construct (The tabletop interface would then display the rules). The physical tokens (Sifteo Cubes) have a small display and can sense touch and gestures as well as spatial configurations (neighbors and stacks).
